verses.verse: God<WH430> blessed<WH1288> Noah<WH5146> and his sons,<WH1121> and said<WH559> to them,<WH6509> "Be fruitful, and multiply,<WH7235> and replenish<WH4390> the earth.<WH776>

The fear of you<WH4172> and the dread of you<WH2844> will be on every animal<WH2416> of the earth,<WH776> and on every bird<WH5775> of the sky.<WH8064> Everything that the ground<WH127> teems<WH7430> with,<WH1709> and all the fish of the sea<WH3220> are delivered<WH5414> into your hand.<WH3027>
Every moving thing<WH7431> that lives<WH2416> will be food<WH402> for you.<WH3418> As the green herb,<WH6212> I have given everything to you.<WH5414>
But<WH389> flesh<WH1320> with its life,<WH5315> its blood,<WH1818> you shall not eat.<WH398>

I will surely<WH389> require<WH1875> your blood<WH1818> of your lives.<WH5315> At the hand<WH3027> of every animal<WH2416> I will require<WH1875> it.<WH3027> At the hand of man,<WH120> even at the hand<WH3027> of every man<WH120>'s brother,<WH251> I will require<WH1875> the life<WH5315> of man.<WH120>
Whoever sheds<WH8210> man<WH120>'s blood,<WH1818> his blood<WH1818> will be shed<WH8210> by man,<WH120> for God<WH430> made<WH6213> man<WH120> in his own image.<WH6754>
Be fruitful<WH6509> and multiply.<WH7235> Increase abundantly<WH8317> in the earth,<WH776> and multiply in it.<WH7235>"
God<WH430> spoke<WH559> to Noah<WH5146> and to his sons<WH1121> with him,<WH559> saying,
"As for me,<WH6965> behold, I establish my covenant<WH1285> with you,<WH2233> and with your offspring after you,<WH310>

and with every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> that is with you:<WH5775> the birds, the livestock,<WH2416> and every animal of the earth<WH776> with you,<WH3318> of all that go out of the ship,<WH8392> even every animal<WH2416> of the earth.<WH776>

I will establish<WH6965> my covenant<WH1285> with you:<WH1320> all flesh will not be cut off<WH3772> any more by the waters<WH4325> of the flood,<WH3999> neither will there ever again be a flood<WH3999> to destroy<WH7843> the earth.<WH776>"

God<WH430> said,<WH559> "This is the token<WH226> of the covenant<WH1285> which I<WH589> make<WH5414> between me and you and every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> that is with you,<WH5769> for perpetual generations:<WH1755>
I set<WH5414> my rainbow<WH7198> in the cloud,<WH6051> and it will be for a sign<WH226> of a covenant<WH1285> between me and the earth.<WH776>
It will happen,<WH6049> when I bring a cloud<WH6051> over the earth,<WH776> that the rainbow<WH7198> will be seen<WH7200> in the cloud,<WH6051>

and I will remember<WH2142> my covenant,<WH1285> which is between me and you and every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> of all flesh,<WH1320> and the waters<WH4325> will no more<WH5750> become a flood<WH3999> to destroy<WH7843> all flesh.<WH1320>

The rainbow<WH7198> will be in the cloud.<WH6051> I will look at it,<WH7200> that I may remember<WH2142> the everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285> between<WH996> God<WH430> and<WH996> every living<WH2416> creature<WH5315> of all flesh<WH1320> that is on the earth.<WH776>"
God<WH430> said<WH559> to Noah,<WH5146> "This is the token<WH226> of the covenant<WH1285> which I have established<WH6965> between me and all flesh<WH1320> that is on the earth.<WH776>"
The sons<WH1121> of Noah<WH5146> who went out<WH3318> from the ship<WH8392> were Shem,<WH8035> Ham,<WH2526> and Japheth.<WH3315> Ham<WH2526> is the father<WH1> of Canaan.<WH3667>
These<WH5146> three<WH2490> were the sons of<WH376> Noah,<WH776> and from these, the whole earth was populated.<WH5310>
Noah<WH5146> began<WH2490> to be a farmer,<WH376> and planted<WH5193> a vineyard.<WH3754>
He drank<WH8354> of the wine<WH3196> and got drunk.<WH7937> He was uncovered<WH1540> within<WH8432> his tent.<WH168>
Ham,<WH2526> the father<WH1> of Canaan,<WH3667> saw<WH7200> the nakedness<WH6172> of his father,<WH1> and told<WH5046> his two<WH8147> brothers<WH251> outside.<WH2351>

Shem<WH8035> and Japheth<WH3315> took<WH3947> a garment,<WH8071> and laid<WH7760> it on both<WH8147> their shoulders,<WH7926> went<WH3212> in backwards,<WH3680> and covered the nakedness<WH6172> of their father.<WH1> Their faces<WH6440> were backwards,<WH322> and they didn't<WH7200> see their father<WH1>'s nakedness.<WH6172>
Noah<WH5146> awoke<WH3364> from his wine,<WH3196> and knew<WH3045> what his youngest<WH6996> son<WH1121> had done to him.<WH6213>
He said,<WH559> "Canaan<WH3667> is cursed.<WH779> He will be servant<WH5650> of servants<WH5650> to his brothers.<WH251>"
He said,<WH559> "Blessed<WH1288> be Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Shem.<WH8035> Let Canaan<WH3667> be<WH1961> his servant.<WH5650>
May God<WH430> enlarge<WH6601> Japheth.<WH3315> Let him dwell<WH7931> in the tents<WH168> of Shem.<WH8035> Let Canaan<WH3667> be his servant.<WH5650>"
Noah<WH5146> lived<WH2421> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> years<WH8141> after<WH310> the flood.<WH3999>
All the days<WH3117> of Noah<WH5146> were nine<WH8672> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> years,<WH8141> then he died.<WH4191>
